review: Amazon Fire is not nearly as fast or feature rich as Roku and it has way less apps available.  It does however, have a great remote, well laid out and fits nice in your hand.  Layout on the Fire is not as good as on the Roku and there are less setup options.  You have to be extremely careful about not inadvertantly making purcheses unless you go to parental controls and use a 5 charavter password for purchases.  When you do that the downside is that you must enter that pin over and over again for various functions.
